column4: Please help, I just need to know, could Ubountu version use live cd?
ubuntu is released on a live CD

that depends -- you can run the applications on the live CD -- you can even install other ones from the online repositories as long as you are connected to the net and have sufficient memory/swap space

you can use a USB stick to save some settings of a live CD session -- i'm not sure about installing applications to it for future sessions although you can save applications on a USB stick which can be installed later
